creator: kadams@gfs.com
text:
Adds a timeout attribute to all of the <serverdeploy> vendor-specific
elements.  Controls how long the build waits for the deploy to finish (set in
milliseconds).  If timeout is set to a valid time (greater than 1), the timeout
is set on the forked java process; otherwise, java.setTimeout is not called.

Created attachment 6216
Patches documentation for serverdeploy
creator: kadams@gfs.com
kadams@gfs.com
text:
If this patch is accepted, it might be good to put in that patches included with
Bug 14525 (http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=14525) at the same
time, as both enhancement requests are related.
